TITLE: Configuring Environment and Creating .env File
DESCRIPTION: Example of setting environment variables and running the configure script to create the required .env file for TON HTTP API service.
SOURCE: https://github.com/toncenter/ton-http-api/blob/master/ton-http-api/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
export TON_API_LITESERVER_CONFIG=private/testnet.json
./configure.py
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Environment Variables (Bash)
DESCRIPTION: Commands to set environment variables and run the configuration script. This is necessary for creating the .env file used by the TON HTTP API service.
SOURCE: https://github.com/toncenter/ton-http-api/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
export TON_API_LITESERVER_CONFIG=private/testnet.json
./configure.py
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Downloading TON Configuration Files for Docker Setup
DESCRIPTION: Commands for creating a private folder and downloading mainnet and testnet configuration files that are required for the TON HTTP API service.
SOURCE: https://github.com/toncenter/ton-http-api/blob/master/ton-http-api/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
mkdir private
curl -sL https://ton-blockchain.github.io/global.config.json > private/mainnet.json
curl -sL https://ton-blockchain.github.io/testnet-global.config.json > private/testnet.json
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Downloading TON Configuration Files (Bash)
DESCRIPTION: Commands to download the mainnet and testnet configuration files for TON. These files are required for setting up the TON HTTP API service.
SOURCE: https://github.com/toncenter/ton-http-api/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
mkdir private
curl -sL https://ton-blockchain.github.io/global.config.json > private/mainnet.json
curl -sL https://ton-blockchain.github.io/testnet-global.config.json > private/testnet.json
```

TITLE: Specifying Python Package Dependencies for TON HTTP API
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet lists the required Python packages and their specific versions for the TON HTTP API project. It includes dependencies for database, logging, API framework, HTTP requests, caching, web servers, and TON-specific functionality.
SOURCE: https://github.com/toncenter/ton-http-api/blob/master/ton-http-api/requirements.txt#2025-04-17_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: Plain Text
CODE:
```
redis==5.0.1
loguru==0.6.0
fastapi==0.99.1
pydantic==1.10.14
requests==2.28.0
ring==0.10.1
uvicorn==0.17.6
gunicorn==20.1.0
pytonlib==0.0.64
inject==4.3.1
```

TITLE: Extracting Liteserver Public Key for Custom Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Python one-liner to extract the public key from a liteserver.pub file and encode it in base64 format for use in a custom configuration file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/toncenter/ton-http-api/blob/master/ton-http-api/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: python
CODE:
```
python -c 'import codecs; f=open("liteserver.pub", "rb+"); pub=f.read()[4:]; print(str(codecs.encode(pub,"base64")).replace("\n",""))'
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Generating Lite Server Public Key (Python)
DESCRIPTION: A Python one-liner to generate the public key from a liteserver.pub file. This is useful when configuring custom lite servers for the TON HTTP API service.
SOURCE: https://github.com/toncenter/ton-http-api/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: python
CODE:
```
python -c 'import codecs; f=open("liteserver.pub", "rb+"); pub=f.read()[4:]; print(str(codecs.encode(pub,"base64")).replace("\n",""))'
```
